definition: to entice/to lead astray
arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
to confuse/to be puzzled
to stir up public sentiment by false statements (idiom)/to resort to demagogy

sentences.english: Snakes are said to fascinate small animals and birds.
sentences.chinese: 據說蛇能蠱惑小動物和小鳥。

sentences.english: We never thought of demagoguing the event.
sentences.chinese: 我們從未想過要拿此事件來蠱惑人心。

sentences.english: This is not reliably rabble-rousing stuff.
sentences.chinese: 這些並非是蠱惑人心的材料。

sentences.english: Not after all my mom has taught me to never surrender to the manipulative ways of advertising.
sentences.chinese: 我媽教我不要輕易相信廣告蠱惑人心的辦法。

sentences.english: I can teach you how to bewitch the mind and ensnare the senses.
sentences.chinese: 我會教你們如何蠱惑意志，俘獲感覺。

sentences.english: There are far subtler ways that sight bewitches and beguiles.
sentences.chinese: 運用視覺引誘蠱惑人有很多技巧。

sentences.english: I can feel that you mesmerize my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我能感受到你在蠱惑我的心智。

sentences.english: You have to tear the elderly demagogic network.
sentences.chinese: 你得撕破老年的蠱惑人心的網。

sentences.english: Snakes are said to fascinate small animals.

definition: to awe/to intimidate
to lash out/to reprimand
to turn a blind eye to
to be eager to give sth a try (idiom)
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
to stop/to obstruct
to encourage/to foster/to foment
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
stratagem/scheme
rude and unreasonable
to coerce (sb into doing sth bad)/to lure (into a trap)/to seduce
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to remain unmoved
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
like a swarm of bees/everyone swarms around pushing and shouting/a hornet's nest
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
